definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent

sentences.english: The nation was seething with discontent as the noblemen continued their arrogant ways.
sentences.chinese: 當貴族依舊驕橫跋扈時，這個國家充滿了不滿情緒。

sentences.english: Every piece of arrogance of the dictatorship is established upon cowardice of anonyms.
sentences.chinese: 專制的每一分驕橫無不建立在匿名者的怯懦之上。

sentences.english: The dominating person must grow in kindness before team will work.
sentences.chinese: 驕橫的人必須學會仁慈，團隊纔有合作。

sentences.english: Pride goeth before destruction: and the spirit is lifted up before a fall.
sentences.chinese: 驕橫是滅亡的先聲，傲慢是隕落的前導。

sentences.english: This was a race of manly men, but insolent and impious.
sentences.chinese: 這時的人類雄偉剛毅，但卻驕橫不虔。

definition: scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
to accumulate/to gather/to amass wealth by heavy taxation or other unscrupulous means/(science) convergent
to be in overall charge/to oversee
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
